Acceptance criteria:

There is a data packet with extremely important information in it. We need to decipher the ego into a human-readable form.
The data is presented below.
This one is represented in the hexadecimal notation. Where every 2 characters is 1 byte of information.
Each byte of data carries a number which must be mapped to a unicode table.
It is clear that the byte order has been passed in reverse order.
